title: How to set and delete cookies with Express
description: Setting cookies and deleting them is easy in Express. You can just use the res.cookie() and res.clearCookie() functions to set cookies and define when they expire, set them as http-only, mark them as secure, and more.
body:
## Setting cookies

```jsx
res.cookie("token", MY_TOKEN, { maxAge: MILLISECONDS_FROM_NOW_TO_EXPIRE })
```

There's more options (other than `maxAge`) described in the [Express documentation](https://expressjs.com/en/api.html#res.cookie). 

## Deleting cookies

```jsx
res.clearCookie("token")
```
